instruction: Describe the taste of Italian food.
output: Italian food has a robust and flavorful taste. It is usually rich in garlic, herbs and spices, with accompaniments of varied tomatoes and cheeses. The flavor combinations of ingredients such as olives, capers and sun-dried tomatoes are often used for adding complexity to Italian dishes. The rich sauces and vibrant flavors of Italian cooking provide an unforgettable dining experience.
